curam.util.administration.intf

Interface XSLTemplateAdmin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    curam.util.administration.base.XSLTemplateAdmin, XSLTemplateAdmin, XSLTemplateAdminFactory

    public interface XSLTemplateAdmin
    The administrator interface to creating and maintaining XSL templates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • addTemplate

        XSLTemplateInstanceKey addTemplate(AddTemplateDtls details)
                            throws AppException,
                                   InformationalException
        Adds a new template to the database. Returns a key to the new template instance (version '1'). The templateID from this key can be used to access the XSLTemplateInst table if required.
        Parameters:
        details - The details of a new new template
        Returns:
        A key to the new template
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_KEY_SET_NOT_FOUND - if the Key Set cannot be found.
        AppRuntimeException - ID_XSL_TEMPLATE_NO_LOCALE - if locale code has not been specified.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • checkOutTemplate

        XSLTemplateInstDetails checkOutTemplate(CheckOutTemplateDtls details)
                                 throws AppException,
                                        InformationalException
        Checks-out a template. This will throw an exception if the specified template does not exist, or if the template is already checked out. If override is true and the template is already checked out, the existing checkout will be canceled and this new checkout will be accepted. The contents of the selected template instance are returned.
        Parameters:
        details - The details of a new template
        Returns:
        The selected template instance
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_XSL_TEMPLATE_CHECKED_OUT - if already checked out
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • undoCheckOutTemplate

        void undoCheckOutTemplate(UndoCheckOutTemplateDtls details)
                   throws AppException,
                          InformationalException
        Undo the latest checkout of a template. If the override field is true, the userID will not be considered, otherwise only the user who checked it out, can undo the checkout.
        Parameters:
        details - checked out template.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_XSL_TEMPLATE_NOT_CHECKED_OUT - if not checked out
        AppException - ID_XSL_TEMPLATE_NO_UNDO - if the user trying to undo the checkout is not the owner
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • checkInTemplate

        XSLTemplateInstanceKey checkInTemplate(CheckInTemplateDtls details)
                                throws AppException,
                                       InformationalException
        Checks in a template that was checked out. An exception will be thrown if the specified template does not exist, or if the specified template is not checked out. Normally, if the specified template is checked out by a different user, an exception will be thrown, however if override is true, the user ID will be ignored. The key to the new template instance will be returned.
        Parameters:
        details - The details of the checked out template.
        Returns:
        The key to the new template instance.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_XSL_TEMPLATE_NOT_CHECKED_OUT - if not checked out.
        AppException - ID_XSL_TEMPLATE_NO_CHECKIN - if the user trying to check the template in is not the owner.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • getAllTemplates

        XSLTemplateDetailsList getAllTemplates()
                                throws AppException,
                                       InformationalException
        Returns all the details of all the XSLTemplate records.
        Returns:
        The details of all the XSLTemplate records.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_XSL_TEMPLATE_NO_TEMPLATES - if there are no templates
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • getTemplateVersions

        XSLTemplateVersionSearchDtlsList getTemplateVersions(XSLTemplateID key)
                                              throws AppException,
                                                     InformationalException
        Returns all the version numbers of a specified template as a list. The list contains versions for a given 'XSLTemplateID.templateID' and 'XSLTemplateID.locale' with country code and without country code. i.e. If the XSLTemplateID provided includes the country part as locale (i.e. 'en_US') the method returns the template versions with this locale and also appends the versions without the country part (e.g. 'en') by truncating the country part from the locale. And If the XSLTemplateID provided does not contain the country part (e.g. 'en'), the items in the template version list returned by the method are repeated twice for a given locale.
        Parameters:
        key - The ID for the specified template.
        Returns:
        The version numbers of a specified template.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_XSL_TEMPLATE_NO_VERSIONS - if there are no template versions.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • getTemplateDetails

        XSLGetTemplateDetails getTemplateDetails(XSLTemplateID key)
                                  throws AppException,
                                         InformationalException
        Returns the details of a specific XSL Template.
        Parameters:
        key - The ID for the specified template.
        Returns:
        The details of an XSLTemplate record.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • getTemplateVersionsForSpecifiedTemplateID

        XSLTemplateVersionSearchDtlsList getTemplateVersionsForSpecifiedTemplateID(XSLTemplateID key)
                                                                    throws AppException,
                                                                           InformationalException
        Returns all template versions for a specified XSLTemplateID. If provided XSLTemplateID.locale contains country part (i.e. 'en_US') and if at least one record is found with this locale then the method returns only the template versions with this locale. If no records found for specified locale containing country part (i.e. 'en_US') the method returns the template versions without country part (e.g. 'en'). Otherwise if provided XSLTemplateID.locale does not contain country part (i.e. 'en') the method returns only the template versions without the country part (e.g. 'en').
        Parameters:
        key - ID for the specified template.
        Returns:
        details of all the XSLTemplate records.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_XSL_TEMPLATE_NO_VERSIONS - when there are no template versions.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
